document.full_text: facebook admitted on thursday it had hired a public relations firm to highlight supposed flaws in google inc's privacy practices but denied it had intended a smear campaign against the search giant.
document.title: facebook admits hiring firm to highlight google flaws
lines_and_colors: facebook admitted on thursday it had hired a public relations firm to highlight supposed flaws in google inc's privacy practices but denied it had intended a smear campaign against the search giant.
